name: [Cozy Arcade] Catnaps
description:
Luring a cat is easy, all you got to do is drag a laser pointer from your corner and wiggle it in front of a cat to get its attention when they change your colour then you need to slowly lure them to your corner. 

This was a submission for The Super Friendship Arcade, the theme of the event was cozy.

Game requires a touch screen that supports up to 4 multiple touches
